item.title: 鲍威尔称 12 月降息远非定局
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示，12 月再次降息并无保证。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said another rate cut in December is not guaranteed.】

item.title: OpenAI 重组为 IPO 和人工智能消费狂潮铺平道路
item.description: 2024 年末，OpenAI 还在从山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）短暂而混乱的下台后的余震中恢复过来，它希望能启动一个相对简单的过程，将公司转变为对投资者更有吸引力的传统营利性企业。然后，反击就来了。【原文：In late 2024, OpenAI, still recovering from the aftershock of the brief, messy ousting of Sam Altman, initiated what it hoped would be a relatively straightforward process of converting to a more traditional for-profit business that would be more appealing to investors. Then came the pushback.】

item.title: OpenAI 进入 "正常 "营利时代，但也有新的未知数
item.description: OpenAI 已经为筹集更多资金扫清了道路，但其公司重组仍存在重大问题。但首先...【原文：OpenAI has cleared the path for raising far more capital, though major questions remain about its corporate restructuring. But first…】

item.title: 美联储将于 12 月 1 日结束资产负债表清算，以应对融资成本的上升
item.description: 美联储周三表示，将从 12 月 1 日起停止缩减国债持有量，结束长达三年之久的努力。【原文：The Federal Reserve on Wednesday said it will stop shrinking its Treasury holdings beginning Dec. 1, ending a three-year long effort after stress signals in money markets intensified in recent days.】

item.title: 德国首次国家安全会议讨论稀土问题
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，德国总理弗里德里希-默茨将在其新成立的国家安全委员会第一次会议上讨论德国对中国稀土的依赖问题。【原文：German Chancellor Friedrich Merz is set to discuss the country’s dependence on China’s rare earths at the first meeting of his newly formed national security council, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 伊利诺伊州州长普利兹克质疑用亿万富翁税资助公共交通的计划
item.description: 伊利诺伊州州长普利兹克（JB Pritzker）表示，对亿万富翁的资产征税并征收其他税款以帮助为芝加哥地区的交通系统提供资金的提案不会以目前的形式推进。【原文：Illinois Governor JB Pritzker said a proposal to tax billionaires’ assets and enact other levies to help fund the Chicago region’s transit system won’t advance in its current form.】

item.title: 鲍威尔称美联储 12 月减息尚未确定后，美国国债暴跌
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示，12 月降息并非板上钉钉，即使在广泛预期的降息四分之一个百分点以支撑劳动力市场之后，美联储主席鲍威尔仍表示，12 月降息并非板上钉钉。【原文：Treasuries extended losses after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said a December interest-rate cut was not set in stone, even after delivering a widely expected quarter-point reduction to prop up the labor market.】

item.title: YouTube 将使用人工智能锐化低分辨率视频
item.description: 谷歌的 YouTube 将利用人工智能来提高其平台上许多低分辨率视频在电视屏幕、网络和移动设备上观看时的视觉清晰度。【原文：Google’s YouTube will use artificial intelligence to improve the visual clarity of many low-resolution videos on its platform when viewed on TV screens, the web and mobile devices.】

item.title: 美联储降息1/4个百分点，资产负债表清算告一段落
item.description: 美联储官员连续第二次降息，以支持疲软的劳动力市场，并表示将在12月1日停止缩减央行的资产组合。【原文：Federal Reserve officials delivered their second consecutive interest-rate reduction to support a softening labor market, and said they would stop shrinking the central bank’s portfolio of assets on Dec. 1.】

item.title: 美联储决定降息四分之一个点的主要启示
item.description: 以下是美联储周三利率决议的主要内容：【原文：Here are key takeaways from the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate decision on Wednesday:】

item.title: 七国集团将宣布关键矿产联盟以对抗中国
item.description: 七国集团将宣布成立一个重要的矿产生产联盟，其中将包括供应协议，以对抗中国在市场上的主导地位。【原文：The Group of Seven nations are set to announce a critical minerals production alliance that would include supply agreements in a bid to counter China’s dominance of the market.】

item.title: 菲索夫 "无法粉饰 "的预测下调令分析师震惊
item.description: Fiserve Inc. 的巨额亏损令分析师大跌眼镜，同时也对该公司的股价造成了沉重打击。【原文：Fiserve Inc.’s massive earnings shortfall baffled analysts even as it dealt a crushing blow to the company’s shares.】

item.title: 伯福特股票在纽约交易中下跌达 15
item.description: 诉讼出资人伯福德资本有限公司（Burford Capital Ltd.）在纽约交易中大幅下跌，原因是阿根廷就其支持的美国法院对南美国家的 160 亿美元判决提起上诉。【原文：Litigation funder Burford Capital Ltd. fell sharply in New York trading during a hearing on Argentina’s appeal of a $16 billion US court judgment plaintiffs it backed won against the South American nation.】

item.title: 市场信号：CoreWeave 90 亿美元竞购 "胎死腹中
item.description: 根据市场交易信号，在周四关键的股东投票之前，CoreWeave 公司拟以 90 亿美元与数据中心供应商 Core Scientific Inc.【原文：CoreWeave Inc.’s $9 billion proposed tie-up with data center provider Core Scientific Inc. is increasingly in doubt ahead of a key shareholder vote Thursday, based on trading signals from the market.】

item.title: 亚马逊事件发生数日后，微软遭遇云计算中断
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）的 Azure 云服务发生故障，导致其自身产品和阿拉斯加航空公司（Alaska Airlines）等多家公司的运营中断。【原文：Microsoft Corp. has suffered an outage in its Azure cloud service that has disrupted its own products and the operations of several companies, including Alaska Airlines.】

item.title: 本田因芯片短缺削减北美部分工厂产量
item.description: 本田汽车公司（Honda Motor Co.）正在削减或暂停其北美部分工厂的生产，原因是关键半导体的短缺有可能蔓延到整个行业的汽车供应链。【原文：Honda Motor Co. is cutting or suspending production at some of its North American plants due to a shortage of critical semiconductors that threatens to spread throughout the industry’s automotive supply chain.】

item.title: 网络研究人员破解漏洞的奖励不断增加
item.description: 人工智能公司为报告的漏洞提供奖励。【原文：AI companies offer rewards for reported vulnerabilities.】

item.title: 英伟达黄仁勋广泛传播人工智能，中美僵局有望解冻
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，伊恩-金将报道英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋在华盛顿举行的 GTC 大会上的讲话。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ian King reports on Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang at the company’s GTC conference in Washington.】

item.title: 贝尔首席执行官称加拿大人工智能主权是国家安全问题
item.description: BCE Inc.首席执行官 Mirko Bibic 表示，随着地缘政治紧张局势的加剧，加拿大的敏感数据必须留在国内。【原文：BCE Inc. Chief Executive Officer Mirko Bibic said sensitive Canadian data must stay within the country, as geopolitical tensions rise.】

item.title: 交易员为 2026 年 12 月前 S&P 500 指数上涨 30% 下注 2100 万美元
item.description: 一位期权交易商甚至让最看涨的华尔街分析师都显得小心翼翼，他对 S&P 500 指数在明年年底前上涨 30% 以上下了大赌注。【原文：One options trader is making even the most bullish Wall Street analysts look cautious, placing a huge bet on the S&P 500 Index shooting up more than 30% by the end of next year.】

item.title: 美联储可能降息，官员正面临数据真空
item.description: 7 月，华盛顿，美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔在联邦公开市场委员会（FOMC）会议后的新闻发布会上。摄影师：Al Drago/Bloomberg【原文：Jerome Powell, chairman of the US Federal Reserve, during a news conference following a Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meeting in Washington in July. Photographer: Al Drago/Bloomberg】

item.title: Vibe 编码领导者光标表示，新的人工智能代理能完成更艰巨的任务
item.description: 人工智能编码初创公司 Cursor 正在发布其受欢迎的人工智能助手的新版本，该版本旨在从头到尾执行更复杂的软件开发任务，可与 OpenAI 和 Anthropic 的产品相媲美。【原文：Cursor, an artificial intelligence coding startup, is releasing a new version of its popular AI assistant that’s designed to carry out more complicated software development tasks from start to finish, rivaling products from OpenAI and Anthropic.】

item.title: 美国银行认为美国国债供应增加将抑制 10 年期国债收益率
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America）的利率策略师表示，预计美国财政部将倾向于用短期票据为赤字融资的决定有可能推动 10 年期国债收益率下跌超过四分之一个百分点。【原文：An anticipated decision by the US Treasury Department to favor short-term bills to finance the deficit has the potential to drive 10-year note yields lower by more than a quarter point, interest-rate strategists at Bank of America say.】

item.title: 中国首次采购美国大豆的消息令大豆贸易商感到失望
item.description: 大豆交易商对中国本季首次购买美国大豆的消息感到失望，因为他们正在等待北京和华盛顿之间备受期待的协议细节。【原文：Soybean traders were underwhelmed by news of China’s first purchases of US cargoes this season, as they await details from a highly anticipated agreement between Beijing and Washington.】

item.title: 北美矿商以 2013 年以来最快速度抛售股票
item.description: 矿业公司正在以十年来最快的速度抛售股票，而那些希望接触到大幅上涨的金价和需求旺盛的关键矿产的投资者们已经欲罢不能了。【原文：Mining companies are selling shares at the fastest clip in a decade, and investors looking for exposure to sharply higher gold prices and in-demand critical minerals can’t get enough.】

item.title: 卡特彼勒称人工智能比推土机更能推动增长
item.description: 卡特彼勒公司（Caterpillar Inc.【原文：Caterpillar Inc., the company synonymous with yellow bulldozers and mining trucks, is getting a boost from another type of machinery.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称，有线电视亿万富翁马龙将卸任自由主席一职
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》报道，亿万富翁、有线电视大亨约翰-马龙（John Malone）即将卸任其媒体和电信帝国的主席一职，这标志着他作为行业先驱和当时一些最重要的媒体和有线电视交易的总设计师，结束了长达数十年的职业生涯。【原文：The billionaire cable-TV mogul John Malone is stepping down as chair of his media and telecoms empire, the Financial Times reported, marking an end to a decades-long career as an industry pioneer and master architect of some of the most significant media and cable deals of his time.】

item.title: 纽约市立大学深化与中心桥、贝恩的合作，帮助学生就业
item.description: 纽约城市大学正在深化与 Centerbridge Partners 和 Bain & Co.等公司的联系，扩大旨在帮助学生毕业时获得工作机会的项目，以提高入学率和保留率。【原文：The City University of New York is deepening its ties with firms like Centerbridge Partners and Bain & Co. to expand programs aimed at helping students graduate with job offers in a bid to boost enrollment and retention.】

item.title: 欧盟资金激增，欧洲顶级无人机制造商欲在华沙上市
item.description: WB Electronics SA 正在考虑在华沙证券交易所出售股票，因为这家欧盟销售额最大的无人机生产商正准备根据欧盟的新国防计划扩大投资规模。【原文：WB Electronics SA is considering selling shares on the Warsaw bourse, as the largest drone producer by sales in the European Union prepares to scale up investments under the bloc’s new defense program.】

item.title: 拉弗为英国经济困境开出药方
item.description:
共和党的反税吟游诗人在本周的Merryn Talks Money节目中进行了解释。【原文：

The Republican Party’s anti-tax bard joins this week’s Merryn Talks Money to explain. 

】
